Mario is the protagonist of the Mario video game series and Nintendo\'s mascot. He was created by Shigeru Miyamoto in 1981 and made his first appearance in the arcade game Donkey Kong. He is an Italian-American plumber who currently lives in the Mushroom Kingdom. As a hero, he is responsible for saving people, especially Princess Peach, whom he has saved many times from the clutches of the fearsome Bowser, who is his arch-enemy.

He is a humble and good-hearted person, who doesn\'t mind how far he has to go to save people who need his help.

He has gained a lot of acceptance and appreciation since his beginnings, and is even considered the most famous video game character.

Mario is a kind, brave, patient, and loyal hero with a strong sense of justice, morality, and goodness, and a great character. He always puts the needs and problems of others before his own. He is willing to risk his life to save millions from the forces of evil. Being heroic, he is dedicated to rescuing Princess Peach from the clutches of Bowser or other villains.

If there\'s something Mario likes more than defeating Bowser, it\'s going on vacation. Mario always brings joy wherever he goes and always has good intentions.

He is compassionate towards others, and has good camaraderie with his brother Luigi, whom he greatly appreciates. Being the older brother and a proclaimed hero, he often shows good leadership qualities. Despite being widely proclaimed, Mario is humble with his achievements and enjoys a quiet life with his friends.

Luigi is Mario\'s younger brother in Nintendo\'s video games. He first appeared in the 1983 arcade game, Mario Bros, then in Super Mario Bros. As the second player, a role he continued to play in Super Mario Bros 3 and Super Mario World. The name Luigi was inspired by a pizza restaurant near the headquarters of Nintendo of America in Redmond, Washington, called "Mario & Luigi\'s".

Luigi is a video game character created by Shigeru Miyamoto. He is usually described as Mario\'s twin brother. Luigi first appeared in the arcade game Mario Bros., where he was introduced as a main character alongside Mario. Sometimes, Luigi has also been the one who directs the credits, as in Super Mario RPG and Paper Mario.

Since his debut, Luigi has appeared in many games in the Mario series, most of the time accompanying Mario as a central protagonist, but he has also starred as the main character in Mario is Missing! and Luigi\'s Mansion.

In most of the main series games, Luigi usually takes the role of the second player, but he has also occasionally appeared as a main character, either as part of a revealed secret in the game or as an unlockable. While Luigi was originally created as an identical character to Mario, except for being green instead of red, Luigi has developed his own personality and style.

Luigi is normally described as cowardly, but once he gathers all his courage, he can be tough and overcome all his fears. He is romantically linked with Princess Daisy in several games.

Princess Peach is the princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. She first appeared in Super Mario Bros for NES. Peach was created by Shigeru Miyamoto and is the damsel in distress in most Mario games. Since her debut in Super Mario Bros, Peach has appeared in almost every game in the franchise, becoming one of the most recognizable icons in video games and the most well-known female video game character in the world.

In the Super Mario series, Peach has only been playable in Super Mario Bros 2 and Super Mario 3D World. However, she has been playable in many of the franchise\'s spinoffs, being playable in all Mario Kart, Mario Party, Mario Tennis, Mario Golf, Mario Strikers, and Mario Baseball games, among many others.

Peach lives in her castle and handles political affairs in the Mushroom Kingdom. Additionally, several Toads such as Master Toadsworth help her manage the kingdom. Peach cares a lot about the citizens of her kingdom, and as seen in Mario & Luigi: Bowser\'s Inside Story, she convenes assemblies to ensure the well-being of the inhabitants of her kingdom from time to time.

She is often kidnapped by Bowser or his minions. However, she always ends up being rescued by Mario. The reasons she is kidnapped by Bowser are because he wants to take control of the Mushroom Kingdom and because he is in love with the princess. In fact, Bowser has tried to marry Peach on several occasions. Nonetheless, Bowser\'s feelings are not reciprocated by Peach. However, despite being constantly kidnapped by him, Peach does not show disdain for Bowser and does not hold a grudge, treating him amicably.

Yoshi is one of the main characters of the franchise. He is a friendly dinosaur belonging to the species of the same name who has helped Mario and Luigi, often being used as a very useful mount that allows them to overcome levels more easily. He has participated in several adventures and has starred in others. He lives on Yoshi\'s Island, a tropical island near the Mushroom Kingdom, though he frequently visits the kingdom.

Initially, it was planned for Yoshi to appear in the first Super Mario Bros game as a mount for Mario, but due to the limitations of the NES, he was not implemented. The idea was also intended for Super Mario Bros 3, but again, the limitations of the NES prevented Yoshi from appearing. Finally, Yoshi appeared in the next game of the series, Super Mario World.

Yoshi became extremely popular among fans, appearing in numerous games from that time until now, as well as becoming the star of his own video game franchise.

Toad is a character from Nintendo\'s Mario video game series. He is a small humanoid with a mushroom-shaped head. They are peaceful people from the Mushroom Kingdom. Like other Mario characters, such as Yoshi, both the species and the main individual are called Toad.

They first appeared in Super Mario Bros, where they said the famous phrase "Thank you Mario / Luigi, but the princess is in another castle" each time Mario reached the end of the first seven castles. In Paper Mario, the Toad Town, the capital of the Mushroom Kingdom, appears, where the Toads known as the mushroom people live.

His companion and friendly relationship is with Toadette. Toad is a happy and somewhat childlike character, he is kind and almost never gets angry. He has always found Mario in his rescues of the princess.

Bowser is the main villain of the Super Mario franchise and the most iconic character in video games. He made his debut in the Super Mario Bros video game, and since then he has appeared in the vast majority of the franchise\'s video games.

He is the king and most powerful of the Koopas. He lives in a huge and dangerous castle in the Koopa Kingdom.Bowser\'s goal in most games is to kidnap Princess Peach, whom he is in love with, and to dominate the Mushroom Kingdom, although his plans are always foiled by Mario.

Bowser has a son named Bowser Jr (Bowsy in Spain), who wants to follow in his father\'s footsteps and helps him kidnap Peach and fight against Mario. Additionally, Bowser is often accompanied by his seven minions, the Koopalings. To accomplish his goals, Bowser has a large and varied army of loyal minions.
